text.listBibl:
References
1 N. Kemmer, " Quantum theory of Einstein-Bose particles and nuclear interaction, " Proceedings of the
Royal Society A, vol. 166, no. 924, pp. 127–153, 1938.
2 R. J. Duffin, " On the characteristic matrices of covariant systems, " Physical Review, vol. 54, no. 12,
article 1114, 1938.
3 N. Kemmer, " The particle aspect of Meson theory, " Proceedings of the Royal Society A, vol. 173, no. 952,
pp. 91–116, 1939.
4 G. Petiau, [Ph.D. thesis], University of Paris, Académie Royale de Belgique. Classe des. Sciences.
Mémoires. Collection in-8o 16, no. 2, 1936.

Physics, vol. 49, no. 1, pp. 10–17, 2010.
6 H. Hassanabadi, B. Yazarloo, S. Zarrinkamar, and A. A. Rajabi, " Duffin-Kemmer-Petiau equation

2011.
7 T. R. Cardoso, L. B. Castro, and A. S. de Castro, " Inconsistencies of a purported probability current in

8 L. Chetouani, M. Merad, T. Boudjedaa, and A. Lecheheb, " Solution of Duffin-Kemmer-Petiau equa-

2004.
